title: Kaze no Na wa Amnesia (A Wind Named Amnesia)
synopsis: Two years ago, a mysterious wind swept over the Earth without warning, taking everyone's memories with it. Not knowing their names or even how to speak, cars crashed, planes dropped from the sky, and society crumbled in an instant. One young man happens to wander into a military testing facility, where he meets Johnny, a young boy who underwent experimental memory enhancement treatment and could, therefore, still remember who he was. Johnny names the young man Wataru and teaches him everything that he can before his frail body fails him.
voices: ['Toda, Keiko', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Saka, Osamu', 'Hidaka, Noriko', 'Kakegawa, Hirohiko', 'Satou, Masaharu', 'Mita, Yuuko', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Gouri, Daisuke']
